price: 101. Lorsqu’il sera soufflé dans le Cor, plus aucun lien de parenté ne prévaudra entre eux, ce jour-là, et nul ne s’enquerra du sort d’un autre.
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
